title: How to Play Sonic the Hedgehog on Nintendo 3DS

steps.headline: Redeem a code for eShop points with a prepaid card or a credit card.
steps.description: If you use a credit card, make sure you have permission.

steps.headline: Search "Sonic the Hedgehog" in the search bar.
steps.description: There will be several titles available. Purchase and download either Sonic the Hedgehog (Game Gear) or Sonic 3D (Genesis).

steps.headline: Enter Sonic the Hedgehog at the main menu.
steps.description: Once it loads, press "Start", and begin a new game.

steps.headline: Press "X" to begin.
steps.description: Use either the D-Pad or the Circle Pad to move Sonic. Press "A" to jump, and "X" to pause. Press "Start" to view the menu.

text: Turn on your Nintendo 3DS. Go to Nintendo eShop. Redeem a code for eShop points with a prepaid card or a credit card. If you use a credit card, make sure you have permission. Search "Sonic the Hedgehog" in the search bar. There will be several titles available. Purchase and download either Sonic the Hedgehog (Game Gear) or Sonic 3D (Genesis). Enter Sonic the Hedgehog at the main menu. Once it loads, press "Start", and begin a new game. Press "X" to begin. Use either the D-Pad or the Circle Pad to move Sonic. Press "A" to jump, and "X" to pause. Press "Start" to view the menu.
